column4: I've asked the reason why they gave the names: Hoary; Breeze; Warty - to Ubuntu but it has been difficult to get an answer. Anyone here knows?
the big guy has a funny sence of Humor.
they are just names that match the animal names.
they all had animal names - you aparently just read the first half of the names. check ubuntu homepage for details :P
could be the audio is in a codec it cant handle
how can i discover?
run the player from the shell and see if any error messages are shown. also try othe rplayers. and check into the 'verbose' message options of the players.
I have so many codecs installed but there is one: something like gst-register that i need. I think!
dont sound familer.. try vlc, or some other players.
this is the message:  totem dvl-animatrix.avi
i would say.. dont use totem. try vlc
a small fan  - may be for the north bridge. you can get large heatsink replacements for the fan for like $5
or get a new better fan for it for about $14
Do you think that if i use the machine without it anything could go wrong?
it may crash if ya play games.. or may over heat and crash
do i have to get the same model of asus motherboard northbridge heatsink to replace the other or it does not matter?
i doubt it it matters. check out that xoxide.com (i think) site that sells parts.
i got a large heatsink to replace the fan on my main pc.. then opened it up and realized it allready had one. :P
how long you been watching this go  on?  its going on like 20 hrs now.
What?
hes been going on for about Hmm 20 hrs now.. demands help then dosent listen,  then rants about how we suck
